reqs: The course is offered to Mining Graduate Students only
courseName: Processing of Mineral Fines - PRO MIN FINES
description: Particulate systems. Role of particle size and interfacial phenomena in properties of disperse systems. Stability of colloids and suspensions DLVO (Dejaguin-Landau-Vervey-Overbeek). Credit will be granted for only one of MINE 522 or MINE 572.
